dependencies.description: The GNU Project's Bourne Again SHell.
dependencies.name: bash

dependencies.description: Old C-bootstrapped go to bootstrap real go
dependencies.name: go-or-gccgo-bootstrap

dependencies.description:
Grep searches one or more input files for lines containing a match to a
specified pattern
dependencies.name: grep

dependencies.description: GNU implementation of the famous stream editor.
dependencies.name: sed

dependent_to.description:
Apptainer is an open source container platform designed to be simple,
fast, and secure. Many container platforms are available, but Apptainer
is designed for ease-of-use on shared systems and in high performance
computing (HPC) environments. Needs post-install chmod/chown steps to
enable full functionality. See package definition or `spack-build-
out.txt` build log for details, e.g.: tail -15 $(spack location -i
apptainer)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt
dependent_to.name: apptainer

dependent_to.description:
AzCopy is a command-line utility that you can use to copy data to and
from containers and file shares in Azure Storage accounts.
dependent_to.name: azcopy

dependent_to.description: Standard networking plugins for container networking
dependent_to.name: cni-plugins

dependent_to.description: An OCI container runtime monitor
dependent_to.name: conmon

dependent_to.description:
Consul is a distributed, highly available, and data center aware
solution to connect and configure applications across dynamic,
distributed infrastructure.
dependent_to.name: consul

dependent_to.description:
Cosign is a go package for container Signing, verification and storage
in an OCI registry.
dependent_to.name: cosign

dependent_to.description:
The Distributed Asynchronous Object Storage (DAOS) is an open-source
software-defined object store designed from the ground up for massively
distributed Non Volatile Memory (NVM).
dependent_to.name: daos

dependent_to.description: direnv is an environment switcher for the shell.
dependent_to.name: direnv

dependent_to.description:
etcd is a distributed reliable key-value store for the most critical
data of a distributed system
dependent_to.name: etcd

dependent_to.description: fzf is a general-purpose command-line fuzzy finder.
dependent_to.name: fzf

dependent_to.description: GitHub's official command line tool.
dependent_to.name: gh

dependent_to.description:
Git LFS is a system for managing and versioning large files in
association with a Git repository. Instead of storing the large files
within the Git repository as blobs, Git LFS stores special "pointer
files" in the repository, while storing the actual file contents on a
Git LFS server.
dependent_to.name: git-lfs

dependent_to.description: GitLab's official command line tool.
dependent_to.name: glab

dependent_to.description:
Glow is a terminal based markdown reader designed from the ground up to
bring out the beauty—and power—of the CLI. Use it to discover markdown
files, read documentation directly on the command line and stash
markdown files to your own private collection, so you can read them
anywhere. Glow will find local markdown files in subdirectories or a
local Git repository.
dependent_to.name: glow

dependent_to.description: go-md2man converts markdown into roff (man pages)
dependent_to.name: go-md2man

dependent_to.description: Encrypted overlay filesystem written in Go
dependent_to.name: gocryptfs

dependent_to.description:
GoShimmer is a prototype node for exploring the implementation of IOTA
2.0
dependent_to.name: goshimmer

dependent_to.description:
The tool for beautiful monitoring and metric analytics & dashboards for
Graphite, InfluxDB & Prometheus & More
dependent_to.name: grafana

dependent_to.description: The github git wrapper
dependent_to.name: hub

dependent_to.description: The world's fastest framework for building websites.
dependent_to.name: hugo

dependent_to.description: Kubectl is a command-line interface for Kubernetes clusters.
dependent_to.name: kubectl

dependent_to.description:
Kubernetes is an open source system for managing containerized
applications across multiple hosts. It provides basic mechanisms for
deployment, maintenance, and scaling of applications.
dependent_to.name: kubernetes

dependent_to.description: A simple terminal UI for git commands
dependent_to.name: lazygit

dependent_to.description: Streaming replication for SQLite.
dependent_to.name: litestream

dependent_to.description:
MinIO is a High Performance Object Storage released under Apache License
v2.0. It is API compatible with Amazon S3 cloud storage service. Use
MinIO to build high performance infrastructure for machine learning,
analytics and application data workloads.
dependent_to.name: minio

dependent_to.description:
MinIO Client (mc) provides a modern alternative to UNIX commands like
ls, cat, cp, mirror, diff etc. It supports filesystems and Amazon S3
compatible cloud storage service (AWS Signature v2 and v4).
dependent_to.name: miniocli

dependent_to.description: GPU accelerated micromagnetic simulator.
dependent_to.name: mumax

dependent_to.description:
Run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other models. Customize and create your
own.
dependent_to.name: ollama

dependent_to.description: ORAS means OCI Registry As Storage
dependent_to.name: oras

dependent_to.description:
An optionally rootless and daemonless container engine: alias
docker=podman
dependent_to.name: podman

dependent_to.description:
Prometheus, a Cloud Native Computing Foundation project, is a systems
and service monitoring system.
dependent_to.name: prometheus

dependent_to.description:
Rclone is a command line program to sync files and directories to and
from various cloud storage providers
dependent_to.name: rclone

dependent_to.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program.
dependent_to.name: restic

dependent_to.description:
CLI tool for spawning containers on Linux according to the OCI
specification
dependent_to.name: runc

dependent_to.description:
Sloc, Cloc and Code: scc is a very fast accurate code counter with
complexity calculations and COCOMO estimates written in pure Go.
dependent_to.name: scc

dependent_to.description:
seqkit: a cross-platform and ultrafast toolkit for FASTA/Q file
manipulation
dependent_to.name: seqkit

dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularity)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt
dependent_to.name: singularity

dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularityce)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt
dependent_to.name: singularityce

dependent_to.description:
skopeo is a command line utility that performs various operations on
container images and image repositories.
dependent_to.name: skopeo

dependent_to.description:
Telegraf is an agent for collecting, processing, aggregating, and
writing metrics.
dependent_to.name: telegraf

dependent_to.description: Fast parallel recursive grep alternative
dependent_to.name: the-platinum-searcher

dependent_to.description:
Trident is a fully supported open source project maintained by NetApp.
It has been designed from the ground up to help you meet the
sophisticated persistence demands of your containerized applications.
dependent_to.name: trident

dependent_to.description:
umoci modifies Open Container images, intending to be a complete
manipulation tool for OCI images.
dependent_to.name: umoci

dependent_to.description:
Xdelta version 3 is a C library and command-line tool for delta
compression using VCDIFF/RFC 3284 streams.
dependent_to.name: xdelta

dependent_to.description:
yq is a portable command-line YAML, JSON, XML, CSV, TOML and properties
processor. This is different from the py-yq package that is a wrapper
around jq.
dependent_to.name: yq

dependent_to.description:
Real-time monitoring of IT components and services, such as networks,
servers, VMs, applications and the cloud.
dependent_to.name: zabbix
